CalculatedMember.name: RCA
CalculatedMember.Formula: CASE WHEN [Geography].Level is [Geography].[Region] AND [Export HS].Level is [Export HS].[HS4] THEN [Measures].[rca_internal] ELSE Null END

CalculatedMember.name: Geo Rank
CalculatedMember.Formula: IIf(IsEmpty([Measures].[FOB US]), Null, Rank([Geography].CurrentMember, Order([Geography].CurrentMember.Siblings, Measures.[FOB US], BDESC)))

CalculatedMember.name: Geo Rank Across Time

Annotations.Annotation: Rank of this geography across all its siblings, by time

CalculatedMember.Formula: Iif(IsEmpty([Measures].[FOB US]), Null, Rank([Geography].CurrentMember, Order([Geography].CurrentMember.Siblings, Aggregate({[Date].CurrentMember}*{[Destination Country].[All Countrys]}*{[Export HS].[All HSs]}, [Measures].[FOB US]), BDESC)))

CalculatedMember.name: Geo Rank Across Time

Annotations.Annotation: Rank of this geography across all its siblings, by time

CalculatedMember.Formula: Iif(IsEmpty([Measures].[CIF US]), Null, Rank([Geography].CurrentMember, Order([Geography].CurrentMember.Siblings, Aggregate({[Date].CurrentMember}*{[Origin Country].[All Countrys]}*{[Import HS].[All HSs]}, [Measures].[CIF US]), BDESC)))

CalculatedMember.name: Value Added
CalculatedMember.Formula: [Measures].[Output] - [Measures].[Intermediates]

CalculatedMember.name: Labour Productivity Based on Sales
CalculatedMember.Formula: Iif([Measures].[Labour] > 0, [Measures].[Output]/[Measures].[Labour], Null)

CalculatedMember.name: Labour Productivity Based on Value Added
CalculatedMember.Formula: Iif([Measures].[Labour] > 0, [Measures].[Value Added] / [Measures].[Labour], Null)

View.SQL:
(SELECT country.date_id as date_id, comuna.geography_id as comuna_id,
country.weighted_mean_income as country_weighted_mean_income,country.weighted_median_income as country_weighted_median_income,country.weighted_gini_income as country_weighted_gini_income,country.lb_weighted_mean_income as country_lb_weighted_mean_income,country.ub_weighted_mean_income as country_ub_weighted_mean_income,country.lb_weighted_median_income as country_lb_weighted_median_income,country.ub_weighted_median_income as country_ub_weighted_median_income,country.lb_weighted_gini_income as country_lb_weighted_gini_income,country.ub_weighted_gini_income as country_ub_weighted_gini_income, region.weighted_mean_income as region_weighted_mean_income,region.weighted_median_income as region_weighted_median_income,region.weighted_gini_income as region_weighted_gini_income,region.lb_weighted_mean_income as region_lb_weighted_mean_income,region.ub_weighted_mean_income as region_ub_weighted_mean_income,region.lb_weighted_median_income as region_lb_weighted_median_income,region.ub_weighted_median_income as region_ub_weighted_median_income,region.lb_weighted_gini_income as region_lb_weighted_gini_income,region.ub_weighted_gini_income as region_ub_weighted_gini_income, comuna.weighted_mean_income as comuna_weighted_mean_income,comuna.weighted_median_income as comuna_weighted_median_income,comuna.weighted_gini_income as comuna_weighted_gini_income,comuna.lb_weighted_mean_income as comuna_lb_weighted_mean_income,comuna.ub_weighted_mean_income as comuna_ub_weighted_mean_income,comuna.lb_weighted_median_income as comuna_lb_weighted_median_income,comuna.ub_weighted_median_income as comuna_ub_weighted_median_income,comuna.lb_weighted_gini_income as comuna_lb_weighted_gini_income,comuna.ub_weighted_gini_income as comuna_ub_weighted_gini_income
FROM economy.fact_income_gini_country_casen country INNER JOIN economy.fact_income_gini_region_casen region ON region.date_id = country.date_id INNER JOIN dim_comunas dc ON dc.region_id = region.geography_id INNER JOIN economy.fact_income_gini_comuna_casen comuna ON comuna.geography_id = dc.comuna_datachile_id AND region.date_id = comuna.date_id )

CalculatedMember.name: Gini
CalculatedMember.Formula: CASE WHEN [Geography].Level.Name = "Region" THEN [Measures].[region_weighted_gini_income] WHEN [Geography].Level.Name = "Comuna" THEN [Measures].[comuna_weighted_gini_income] WHEN [Geography].Level.Name = "(All)" THEN [Measures].[country_weighted_gini_income] END

CalculatedMember.name: LB Gini
CalculatedMember.Formula: CASE WHEN [Geography].Level.Name = "Region" THEN [Measures].[region_lb_weighted_gini_income] WHEN [Geography].Level.Name = "Comuna" THEN [Measures].[comuna_lb_weighted_gini_income] WHEN [Geography].Level.Name = "(All)" THEN [Measures].[country_lb_weighted_gini_income] END

CalculatedMember.name: UB Gini
CalculatedMember.Formula: CASE WHEN [Geography].Level.Name = "Region" THEN [Measures].[region_ub_weighted_gini_income] WHEN [Geography].Level.Name = "Comuna" THEN [Measures].[comuna_ub_weighted_gini_income] WHEN [Geography].Level.Name = "(All)" THEN [Measures].[country_ub_weighted_gini_income] END

CalculatedMember.name: Mean Income
CalculatedMember.Formula: CASE WHEN [Geography].Level.Name = "Region" THEN [Measures].[region_weighted_mean_income] WHEN [Geography].Level.Name = "Comuna" THEN [Measures].[comuna_weighted_mean_income] WHEN [Geography].Level.Name = "(All)" THEN [Measures].[country_weighted_mean_income] END

CalculatedMember.name: LB Mean Income
CalculatedMember.Formula: CASE WHEN [Geography].Level.Name = "Region" THEN [Measures].[region_lb_weighted_mean_income] WHEN [Geography].Level.Name = "Comuna" THEN [Measures].[comuna_lb_weighted_mean_income] WHEN [Geography].Level.Name = "(All)" THEN [Measures].[country_lb_weighted_mean_income] END

CalculatedMember.name: UB Mean Income
CalculatedMember.Formula: CASE WHEN [Geography].Level.Name = "Region" THEN [Measures].[region_ub_weighted_mean_income] WHEN [Geography].Level.Name = "Comuna" THEN [Measures].[comuna_ub_weighted_mean_income] WHEN [Geography].Level.Name = "(All)" THEN [Measures].[country_ub_weighted_mean_income] END

CalculatedMember.name: Median Income
CalculatedMember.Formula: CASE WHEN [Geography].Level.Name = "Region" THEN [Measures].[region_weighted_median_income] WHEN [Geography].Level.Name = "Comuna" THEN [Measures].[comuna_weighted_median_income] WHEN [Geography].Level.Name = "(All)" THEN [Measures].[country_weighted_median_income] END

CalculatedMember.name: LB Median Income
CalculatedMember.Formula: CASE WHEN [Geography].Level.Name = "Region" THEN [Measures].[region_lb_weighted_median_income] WHEN [Geography].Level.Name = "Comuna" THEN [Measures].[comuna_lb_weighted_median_income] WHEN [Geography].Level.Name = "(All)" THEN [Measures].[country_lb_weighted_median_income] END

CalculatedMember.name: UB Median Income
CalculatedMember.Formula: CASE WHEN [Geography].Level.Name = "Region" THEN [Measures].[region_ub_weighted_median_income] WHEN [Geography].Level.Name = "Comuna" THEN [Measures].[comuna_ub_weighted_median_income] WHEN [Geography].Level.Name = "(All)" THEN [Measures].[country_ub_weighted_median_income] END

View.SQL: SELECT *, (income * weight) AS weighted_income from economy.fact_income_nesi

Row.Value: Ocupados con menos de 1 mes en el empleo actual
Ocupados con menos de 1 mes en el empleo actual
Ocupados con más de 1 mes en el empleo actual
Ocupados con más de 1 mes en el empleo actual

MeasureExpression.SQL: PERCENTILE_DISC(0.5) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY income ASC)

CalculatedMember.name: Weighted Median Income Rank
CalculatedMember.Formula: Rank([Geography].CurrentMember, Order(Geography.CurrentMember.Level.Members, Measures.[Median Income], BASC))

CalculatedMember.name: Weighted Median Income Decile
CalculatedMember.Formula: (Measures.[Weighted Median Income Rank] * 10) / count(Geography.CurrentMember.Level.Members)

Row.Value: Inactivos que estuvieron disponibles para trabajar
Inactivos que estuvieron disponibles para trabajar
Inactivos que no buscaron trabajo ni estuvieron disponibles
Inactivos que no buscaron trabajo ni estuvieron disponibles

CalculatedMember.name: Number of records
CalculatedMember.Formula: IIF(Date.CurrentMember.Level.Name = 'Year', ( [Measures].[Internal Number of records], LastNonEmpty(Descendants([Date].CurrentMember), [Measures].[Internal Number of records]) ), [Measures].[Internal Number of records])

CalculatedMember.name: Expansion factor
CalculatedMember.Formula: IIF(Date.CurrentMember.Level.Name = 'Year', ( [Measures].[Internal Expansion factor], LastNonEmpty(Descendants([Date].CurrentMember), [Measures].[Internal Expansion Factor]) ), [Measures].[Internal Expansion factor])

CalculatedMember.name: PSU Average
CalculatedMember.Formula: [Measures].[PSU AVG Individual] / [Measures].[Number of records]

CalculatedMember.name: PSU Rank
CalculatedMember.Formula: Rank(Geography.CurrentMember, Order(Geography.CurrentMember.Level.Members, Measures.[PSU Average], BASC))

CalculatedMember.name: PSU Rank Decile
CalculatedMember.Formula: (Measures.[PSU Rank] * 10) / count(Geography.CurrentMember.Level.Members)
